item.description:
A bit of Tuscany in downtown Middletown...Tuscany Grill!

They serve above average Italian food and have a large wine list. The atmosphere is very comfortable with "tuscan" decor. The bar area is unique- a large square bar that has high ceilings open to second floor balconies that houses additional small tables. The bar crowd seems to be a popular spot for that enjoy to toss a few back and meet new people.....Excellent pre-meal bread, great apps. The staff is very friendly and helpful.

Come enjoy the wine, pasta, atmosphere and conversation! Mama Mia, you won't be sorry!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or the Meetup sign...

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: A Tuscan Night @ Tuscany Grill in Middletown!
